Introduction

Lim Hyunsik is a South Korean singer under BTOB Company. He is a member of the boy group BTOB and its sub-unit BTOB-BLUE.

He made his debut as a member of BTOB on March 21, 2012 with their first single "Insane".

He made his solo debut on October 14, 2019 with his first mini album Rendez-Vous.
